mapper.insert: INSERT INTO invite_code (code, description, expires_at) VALUES (#{code}, #{description}, #{expiresAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, code, description, CASE WHEN status = 'UNUSED' AND expires_at < NOW() THEN 'EXPIRED' ELSE status END AS status, expires_at FROM invite_code ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE invite_code SET status = 'RESERVED', reserved_at = NOW(), reserved_by = #{userUuid} WHERE code = #{code} AND status = 'UNUSED' AND expires_at > NOW()
UPDATE invite_code SET status = 'UNUSED', reserved_at = NULL, reserved_by = NULL WHERE status = 'RESERVED' AND reserved_at < NOW() - INTERVAL 10 MINUTE
